subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|辵|alt1=辶|t1=motion|犀|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – to move slowly, to be late.

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
